set_frame(minx, miny, width, height)[source]¶

Set region of interest (ROI) for image capture.

Parameters

  • minx – Leftmost extent of ROI.

  • miny – Uppermost extent of ROI.

  • width – Width of ROI.

  • height – Height of ROI.

True on success.
